Boys Camp Solanus - Girls Give Give Annual Catholic Appeal Stewardship Legacy GIving Scroll YOUR HOME IN THE HARBOR‚Ä¶ YOUR FAMILY OF FAITH St. Nicholas Roman Catholic Parish is a community of disciples called to grow in holiness and lead all to the Father through Jesus Christ.¬†United in the Eucharistic Sacrifice and anointed by the Holy Spirit, we reverently celebrate the Liturgy, boldly proclaim the Truth of the Gospel, and courageously lead a life of Christian Love. MASS TIMES Saturday¬† 5:00 PM Sunday¬† 9:00 & 11:00 AM Monday, Thursday & Friday¬†- 9:00 AM Thursday - 6:00 PM CONFESSION TIMES Thursday 5:00 - 5:45 PM Saturday 3:30 - 4:30 PM Holy Days WHAT‚ÄôS HAPPENING Register Here Volunteer 18 ‚ÄúBring them here to me,‚Äù he said. 19 And he directed the people to sit down on the grass. Taking the five loaves and the two fish and looking up to heaven, he gave thanks and broke the loaves. Then he gave them to the disciples, and the disciples gave them to the people. 20 They all ate and were satisfied, and the disciples picked up twelve basketfuls of broken pieces that were left over. 21 The number of those who ate was about five thousand men, besides women and children. ~ Matthew Chapter 14 NIV Parish Family 52 Prince of Peace https://www.princeofpeacebelfair.org/ St. Gabriel https://www.stgabepop.org/ St. Nicholas https://www.stnicholascc.org/ ‚ÄúThe status quo is no longer an option. We must creatively move forward with prayer and courage to reinvigorate our parishes, invite more people into the Catholic faith and carry out the true mission of the Church.‚Äù ~Archbishop Paul D. Etienne Prayer for the Partners in the Gospel Learn More ADORATION OF THE BLESSED SACRAMENT Come visit our Lord Jesus Christ in the Blessed Sacrament. When: Thursdays from 9:30 AM- 5:00 PM. If you are interested in signing up for a weekly slot or to be a substitute please email Amy . If you cannot come during those times, know that our Lord is still always present in the Tabernacle, and the church doors are open: M-F, 8 AM - 5 PM Sat, 3:30 PM - 5 PM Sun, 9:30 AM - 11 AM read our bulletin for the rest of the latest news and events ST. NICHOLAS CATHOLIC SCHOOL VISIT OUR SCHOOL United by the love of Christ, St. Nicholas Catholic School, in partnership with parents and parish, teaches the fullness of the Catholic faith, fosters academic excellence, and nurtures a community of disciples. Learn more TIME. TALENT. TREASURE. CLick here to get involved at Saint Nicholas CLICK HERE TO MAKE YOUR GIFT TODAY ‚Äú They rejoiced when the waves grew quiet. Then He guided them to the harbor they longed for. ‚Äù ‚Äî PSALM 107:30 Welcome Mission Statement Mass Banner Banner 2 What's Happening Visit Our School Banner 3 Banner 1 Closing Block St. Nicholas Catholic Church 3510 Rosedale Street NW, Gig Harbor, WA, 98335 (253) 851-8850 Hours Mon 8am - 5pm Tue 8am - 5pm Wed 8am - 5pm Thu 8am - 5pm Fri 8am - 5pm Sun 10am - 1pm Seattle Archdiocese Protect & Heal USCCB Vatican ST. NICHOLAS CATHOLIC PARISH 3510 Rosedale Street NW, Gig Harbor, WA 98335 P:  (253) 851-8850   F:  (253) 525-1120 St. Nicholas of Tolentino, pray for us! Contact Us

Staff Members ‚Äì Clones Family Resource Centre Skip to content Clones Family Resource Centre Clones Family Resource Centre aims to empower the people of Clones to have an improved quality of life and sense of wellbeing through encouraging equality, participation , community ownership and a recognition of the diversity of families. Menu Home About Contact us ‚Ä¶ News Community Newsletter Events IFI Decade of Commemoration Talks and tours The Open Mic Upskilling Women Supports Family Supports Family Mediation Services Services Summer Camp Counselling Charity Shop Groups Clones Parenting Group Men‚Äôs Shed The Circle of Friends Group Parent and Toddler Group Hen‚Äôs Shed Knitting Group Links Staff Members Project Coordinator / Manager Angela Graham is responsible for managing the day to day running of Clones Family Resource Centre and reporting on a regular basis to the voluntary Board of Management.¬† Her role includes family support, supervision and support of other FRC staff, managing the staff team in the charity shop Second Time ‚ÄòRound, attending networking meetings and making grant applications. Development Worker Colm Laighneach is employed by Clones FRC as a Development Worker on a part-time basis and is mainly engaged in supporting families and individuals in the local community with welfare rights, advocacy etc.¬† Other key areas of Colm‚Äôs work is supporting Clones Men‚Äôs Shed and local resident‚Äôs groups.¬† Colm is trained in providing parenting supports and works in partnership with other local agencies to deliver programmes in and around Clones. Networking Officer Dara MacGabann is employed by Clones FRC as a Networking Officer under the International Fund for Ireland‚Äôs Peace of Mind project.¬† Dara‚Äôs main focus in on providing a programme of activities and training for the core groups associated with Clones FRC such as Clones Toddler Group, Clones Parenting Group, Clones Men‚Äôs Shed, Second Time ‚ÄòRound Charity Shop and the Circle of Friends Women‚Äôs Group.¬† Dara works on a cross border basis linking with the Oak Healthy Living Centre, Lisnaskea, Co. Fermanagh. Administrator Annmarie Fryers is employed by Clones FRC as Administrator.¬† She ensures that all financial matters relating to ¬†the FRC are carried out to a high standard and in an efficient and timely manner.¬† Annmarie currently divides her time between the core administrative work of the FRC and the financial requirements of new IFI funded project, Peace of Mind. Like Loading... Search Search for: More About Voluntary Board of Management Contact Information Clones Family Resource Centre, Clones, Co. üå± Fort Pierce Patch.am - What you need to know today: Free Newsletter, Local News, Events & Calendar Skip to main content Fort Pierce, FL Post Nearby West Palm Beach News Boca Raton News Orlando News Aventura News Lakeland News Fort Myers News Miami Beach News Miami News Plant City News Coral Gables-Coconut Grove News Events Local Businesses Classifieds Weather See all communities Promote on Patch Nearby Communities West Palm Beach, FL Boca Raton, FL Orlando, FL Aventura, FL Lakeland, FL Fort Myers, FL Miami Beach, FL Miami, FL Plant City, FL Coral Gables-Coconut Grove, FL State Edition Florida National Edition Top National News See All Communities Stay in the loop with what's happening in Fort Pierce Never miss out on local news and events that matter to you. Enter email address Enter email address Sign me up! üå± Machete attack on police at Fort Pierce Walmart Coffee in hand, Fort Pierce? We've got the latest town updates for you. Keep reading to stay in the loop. ‚òÄÔ∏è In today's newsletter: Machete attack on police at Fort Pierce Walmart Accused Trump assassin's trial unfolds in Fort Pierce Help needed to find missing man in Fort Pierce Also on today's calendar: Levitt Amp 2025 ‚Äì Fort Pierce Music Series Concerts ‚Äì Featuring Norside ‚Äì Opening With Sippolito Sounds and 5 more events. Today's riddle: What do spiders eat with fried chicken? ü§î (Answer below!) Weather forecast: Thursday: Heavy afternoon thunderstorms, with a high of 88 and low of 74 degrees. üå∂ Hot! Friday: A couple of thunderstorms, temps: high: 84, low: 73. Saturday: Partly sunny, a shower or two, with a high of 87 and low of 74 degrees. üì∞ News we're reading 1. VIDEO: Machete-wielding man lunges for police in Florida Walmart ( wfla.com ) ‚Äî A man from Vero Beach faces multiple felony charges after attacking police with a machete at a Walmart in Fort Pierce. The chaotic incident unfolded as officers responded to reports of a man wielding a machete in the store. 2. Lunatic repping himself in attempted Trump assassination trial files bonkers witness list ( nypost.com ) ‚Äî Ryan Routh, accused of plotting to assassinate Trump, is representing himself in a trial that began with jury selection in Fort Pierce. He filed a bizarre witness list and faces serious charges, including attempted murder. 3. Fort Pierce Police seek help finding missing man with health concerns ( cw34.com ) ‚Äî The Fort Pierce Police Department is urgently seeking help to locate Ronnie Kruse, a 55-year-old man with health concerns, who was last seen driving in the area. Authorities are asking anyone with information to contact them immediately. 4. Jury seated in trial of man accused of Trump assassination attempt ( wfin.com ) ‚Äî The trial of Ryan Routh, accused of attempting to assassinate Donald Trump, is underway in Fort Pierce. Opening statements are set to begin following jury selection, with Routh facing serious federal charges including attempted assassination. üóì Upcoming Events in

VA is building a NEW HOSPITAL and outpatient for VETERANS in
VERO BEACH. It will be on 37th St Across from Cleveland‚Ä¶ ( Nextdoor Spanish Lakes Blvd) A Florida man was arrested after swinging a machete at a Fort Pierce police officer inside a Walmart along Okeechobee Boulevard, officials said. www...  (X: fox35orlando ) #MISSING MAN | Fort Pierce Police are searching for 55-year-old Ronnie Kruse, last seen driving an F-150 or F-250, possibly heading toward Okeechobee...  (X: CBS12 ) Golden Corral posted a job opening for Food Prep Person in Fort Pierce. Apply here. The Reserves Network, Inc. posted a job opening for Housekeeper in Fort Pierce. Apply here. You can search for other jobs near Fort Pierce here. Ok Fort Pierce! So now you're in the loop about what's happening today. Thanks for reading, and see you in your inbox next time! Oh -- and if you like what you're reading, invite a friend to Patch AM! -- The Patch AM Team P.S. The answer to today's riddle: Corn on the cobweb. Got a good riddle for PatchAM? Employee Tools *Formerly Hire Enterprise/SearchSoft Education Tools Employee Resources (HR, Payroll) PPS Communications Hub The PPS Experience Customer Service Standards Logos, Powerpoint Templates, Letterheads Click Here PPS Online Store Click Here Resources PPS School Marketing Workbook RFP Template PPS Mobile App Download in the App Store Click Here Download in the Google Play Console Click Here Support Requests Graphic Design Intake Form PPS District Website Page Request Form Media Policies and Guidelines 1006 News Media Relations Download News Media Relations Guidelines -AR 1001 School-Community Relations Download Operations of School District-owned Social Media Accounts -AR When contacted by the media, please follow these steps: Ask the reporter to provide: ‚Ä¢ Their name and contact information ‚Ä¢ The topic of interest ‚Ä¢ Their deadline for the story Let the reporter know that someone will follow up with them in a timely manner. Immediately contact Ebony Pugh, Director of Public Relations and Media Content, at 412-529-3616 or epugh1@pghschools.org to discuss next steps. If you prefer not to speak with the reporter, kindly refer them directly to Ebony Pugh and provide her contact information listed above. Central Office Support Directory Click Here Who Do I Contact for Help? PPS Support Email Email support@pghschools.org at any time to submit a support request or call 412-529-HELP (4357) during business hours: Monday-Friday 6:30-4:30 Let's Talk Submit a support ticket via Let's Talk at any time. Bellefield Ave. Pittsburgh PA 15213 (412) 529-HELP (4357) The Pittsburgh Public School District is the largest of 43 school districts in Allegheny County and second largest in Pennsylvania. The District provides students, in PreK through Grade 12, a variety of options to help them succeed in school and prepare them for college, career, and life.
